entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 6:30 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
